DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate sleep onset following administration of zolpidem tartrate sublingual tablet (Intermezzo) versus placebo in adult insomnia patients.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Zolpidem Tartrate Sublingual Tablet in Adult Patients With Insomnia
DOC.criteria: Adults with history of sleeplessness Allergic to investigational drug Any conditions and medications that may interfere with study drug evaluation
